According to him, it will have many benefits and high monetary support. -Details will be made public soon, in the coming days,- - transmits channel 24. -This is for those who want to join the army. Description: Z-channels accuse the command of the Russian Armed Forces of false reports about the situation in the Kursk directionOn February 6, 2025, Ukrainian troops carried out In the Kursk direction, the second attack in the last month in order to expand the bridgehead and move the front away from Sudzha. On the same day, the Russian Ministry of Defense reported that the Ukrainian Armed Forces launched eight waves attacks. -With the support of aviation and artillery, the Ukrainian assault units were stopped and defeated,- the report says. However, on February 7, the Institute for the Study of War (ISW) and Z-channels reported that in days the Ukrainian Armed Forces advanced 5 kilometers southeast of Suji. Z-volunteer Roman Alekhin wrote a post in which he stated that the command of the Russian Armed Forces is hiding the truth and sending soldiers into battle without proper training, increasing losses: -It is the command of the Russian Armed Forces in the direction that is to blame for the fact that yesterday the enemy improved its position in the Kursk region. And it may very well be that today he will continue to improve his position, and the command, in order to hide another lie of recent months, will again begin to drive soldiers without training, increasing losses.-Alekhine especially harshly criticizes General Sukhrab Akhmedov, whose departure from the 20th Army, according to the author, became a real holiday for everyone. He notes that his mistakes, like the mistakes of other generals, continue to cost dearly on the battlefield.Previously, Z-channels accused General Akhmedov of giving away in June 2023 orderto line up Russian military personnel in the Kremennaya area, preparing them for action - as a result, the Ukrainian Armed Forces struck a military concentration with a HIMARS missile. The Marines of the 155th Brigade also mentioned Akhmedov in their complaint to the governor of Primorsky Krai, in which they expressed dissatisfaction with the command and huge losses near Pavlovka in Donetsk region.In December 2023, Putin signed a decree awarding Akhmedov the rank of lieutenant general.

Title: üñº A new regime for the expulsion of illegal migrants has begun t...
Description: A new regime for the expulsion of illegal migrants has come into effect in Russia On February 5, the regime for expulsion for foreigners illegally staying in the country came into force in Russia. They will be entered into the register of controlled persons, which involves a number of restrictions and prohibitions before subsequent deportation. The register is posted on the official website of the Ministry of Internal Affairs and is available in the public domain. A foreigner is considered to be notified of inclusion in the list from the moment the data is published. Persons included in the register will not be able to change their place of residence without permission from the Ministry of Internal Affairs, travel outside the region, drive vehicles, purchase property, register real estate in the cadastral register, open bank accounts and make financial transactions. In addition, such migrants are required to appear at the Ministry of Internal Affairs upon request. In the event of a double violation of the established restrictions, they are deported and placed in a special institution of the department. Also, from February 5, employees of the Ministry of Internal Affairs received the right to independently expel foreign citizens from the country for violations provided for by the Code of Administrative Offences. These powers were given to the heads of territorial police bodies and their deputies, as well as the heads of departments for migration and drug control. The decision on deportation for violating the rules of stay can now be made by the heads of the transport police.
